document_data.name: Noreyth Harpell
document_data.titles: Master of the charm{{Cite dungeon/126/Vampires of Waterdeep: Blood of Malar|75}}
document_data.home: [[Undermountain]], [[Waterdeep]]{{Cite dungeon/126/Vampires of Waterdeep: Blood of Malar|66}}
document_data.destroyednotes: (Killed by [[Dhusarra yr Fadila el Abhuk]] in his crypt){{Cite dungeon/126/Vampires of Waterdeep: Blood of Malar|67}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Noreyth Harpell''' was the master [[vampire]] of [[Dhusarra yr Fadila el Abhuk]].
document_data.History:
He was attacked in [[1315 DR]] by the [[Company of the Red Dawn]], who were sent by the [[undead]] vampire [[Artor Morlin]] because Noreyth encroached upon his territory. 

Noreyth and Dhusarra escaped from the ambush, but she later murdered Harpell in his crypt.
